title: 24-Hour Session Wheel
prompt: Create a 24-hour circular clock diagram showing forex trading sessions. Circular wheel divided into 24 segments (hours). Highlight active trading zones: London session (07:00-10:00 UTC) in blue (#3B82F6), New York session (12:00-15:00 UTC) in red (#EF4444), Overlap period (12:00-16:00 UTC) in gold (#F59E0B) with 'BEST' label. Asian session hint in purple (#8B5CF6). Gray out inactive hours. Add 'No Trade Zone' marker for Friday 18:00-24:00 in dark red. Include clock hands or current time indicator. Show WIB (Jakarta) times in outer ring, UTC in inner ring. Globe icons for each major session (London/NY). Dark background (#0F172A). Modern infographic wheel style.
negative_prompt: flat colors, hard to distinguish sessions, cluttered labels, inconsistent segment sizes
